info.name: Enhancing Tax Workflows- GoSystem Tax Copy

request.description:
This endpoint generates one-time use authorization code which is used in code parameter of oauth2/v1/token endpoint. The authorization code expires after 60 seconds.
Parameters for this endpoint are client_id, login_id, firm, center, state, api_token. login_id, firm, center are your GoSystem login details. api_token should be retrieved from logging into GoSystem and going to Options (On the right)-> API Token menu.

response.name: rate_limit_exceed - the rate limit for your application/company has been met
error_api_gateway - an error occurred in Apigee (for example, company may be missing custom attributes)

Types of error in message:
invalid_client_id - missing or invalid invalid_grant_type - missing or invalid invalid_scope - missing, invalid or improperly formed invalid_client_assertion - missing, invalid or improperly formed invalid_client_assertion_type
Error verifying user OR Error verifying Token
invalid_api_uri - the URI provided is not valid
Success. The auth code is generated.

request.description:
This endpoint verifies and authenticates your organization and application entitlements, permissions and validity when calling GoSystem APIs.
The authorization code grant (3-legged oAuth) requires client_id, scope, grant_type, code and client_secret. The client_secret should be retrieved from developer portal keys. Code will be returned from authorize call. Code expires after 60 seconds.
Access tokens (also known as bearer tokens) are inserted in the Authorization parameter. Tokens expire after 60 minutes and must be regenerated to continue calling APIs.

response.name:
Types of error in message:
unauthorized_token - client assertion is expired, improper issued_at, or issuer does not have access. Additionally, the issuer may not match public key on file

unauthorized_client_id - Client Id has been revoked or expired unau

header.description: Content Header

response.name: error_api_gateway - an error occurred in Apigee (for example, company may be missing custom attributes)

header.description: Content Header

response.name: rate_limit_exceed - the rate limit for your application/company has been met

header.description: Content Header

response.name: invalid_api_uri - the URI provided is not valid

header.description: Content Header

response.name:
Types of error in message:
invalid_client_id - missing or invalid invalid_grant_type - missing or invalid invalid_scope - missing, invalid or improperly formed invalid_client_assertion - missing, invalid or improperly formed invalid_client_assertion_type

header.description: Content Header

response.name: Success. A token is generated.

header.description: Content Header

response.body:
{
 "success": "mollit tempor fugiat",
 "token": "velit sunt fugiat",
 "token_type": "BearerToken",
 "expires_in": "enim nostrud qui consequat",
 "issued_at": "laboris culpa laborum tempor reprehenderit",
 "client_id": "dolor veniam ipsum",
 "refresh_token": "sint nostrud eu qui",
 "refresh_token_expires_in": "do"
}

request.description:
Access token is short lived. It will expire after 60 minutes. This endpoint refreshes your access token with the help of refresh token.
Refresh token endpoint requires client_id and client_secret to be sent in basic authorization header. client_id and client_secret should be retrieved from developer portal keys. grant_type needs to be passed as refresh_token and valid refresh token received from /oauth2/v1/token call needs to be passed as refresh_token. Refresh token expires after 24 hours.

response.name: error_api_gateway - an error occurred in Apigee (for example, company may be missing custom attributes)

header.value: Basic  {{ base64 encoded client id:client secret }}
header.description: (Required) Insert the base64 encoded client id and client secret

item.name: Retrieves available V2 print options for the tax return

header.description: (Required) Add Account information

query.description:
Corp Type only applicable for Tax Return Type 1120 and one of the below listed value is required   
 C -> 1120C   
 F -> 1120F   
 H -> 1120H   
 L -> 1120LIFE   
 R -> 1120RIC   
 S -> 1120S   
 T -> 1120REIT   
 Y -> 1120PC

(Required) Selection A or K-1, default value is A. one of the below listed value is required  
 A -> All, Applicable for all tax return types.  
 C -> K-1 Package, applicable only for 1065  tax return types.

header.description: (Required) A 40-digit alphanumeric value that is case sensitive with no separators and run through hash algorithm SHA-1 that should include unique information such as the hardware serial number and UUID together of the machine that created the E-file. Reference the E-file Glossary section in this document published by the IRS - https://www.irs.gov/pub/irs-pdf/p1345.pdf
(Required) Add Account information
